channel.title: MacOS on Ruddra
channel.description: Recent content in MacOS on Ruddra

item.title: Install MySQL and MySQLClient(Python) in MacOS
item.description: Connecting to MySQL from Python in MacOS is a very problematic and painful process. In this post, we are going to see how to install MySQL and connect a Python application to it using mysqlclient. Table of contents ︎ Step one: install Homebrew Step two: install MySQL Step three: install MySQL-Connector-C Step four: install XCode-Select Step five: install OpenSSL Step six: unlink MySQL and link MySQL-Connector-C Step seven: install mysqlclient Step eight: link MySQL back again In conclusion

item.title: Make MacOS Notifications From RSS Feed Using Python
item.description: Today we are going to see how make OSX notifications from RSS Feed of any website using Python. So first of all, let us see how to make a simple notification. We are going to use AppleScript for this. Table of contents ︎ Command for notification in AppleScript Start coding for application Integrate AppleScript in application In conclusion
